title: Linear Equations in Two Variables
description: Solving simultaneous linear equations using substitution and elimination methods
description_zh: 使用代入法和消元法求解二元一次方程组
objectives_zh: 用代入法求解二元一次方程组
用消元法求解二元一次方程组

sections.title: Substitution Method
sections.content: To solve simultaneous equations by substitution: 1) Make one variable the subject in one equation, 2) Substitute into the other equation, 3) Solve for the remaining variable, 4) Find the other variable. Example: Singapore hawker stalls - if 2 plates of chicken rice and 3 drinks cost $12, and 1 plate costs $2 more than a drink, find the prices.
sections.content_zh: 用代入法求解二元一次方程组：1）在一个方程中将一个变量表示为另一个的函数，2）代入另一个方程，3）求解剩余变量，4）求另一个变量。例如：新加坡小贩摊位 - 如果2盘鸡饭和3杯饮料共12元，1盘比1杯贵2元，求价格。

sections.title: Elimination Method
sections.content: To solve by elimination: 1) Make coefficients of one variable equal by multiplying, 2) Add or subtract equations to eliminate that variable, 3) Solve for remaining variable, 4) Substitute back to find the other. Useful for Singapore transportation problems (MRT + bus trips).
sections.content_zh: 用消元法求解：1）通过乘法使一个变量的系数相等，2）加减方程消去该变量，3）求解剩余变量，4）代回求另一个。适用于新加坡交通问题（地铁+巴士行程）。

sections.title: Real-World Applications
sections.content: Simultaneous equations solve problems involving: pricing (GST-inclusive vs exclusive), mixtures (coffee stalls mixing beans), motion (MRT and walking speeds), and budgeting (HDB conservancy charges).
sections.content_zh: 二元一次方程组解决涉及以下问题：定价（含消费税与不含）、混合（咖啡摊混合咖啡豆）、运动（地铁和步行速度）和预算（组屋管理费）。

title: Algebraic Manipulation & Formulae
description: Expansion, factorization, and changing the subject of formulae
description_zh: 展开、因式分解和改变公式主项
objectives: Change the subject of a formula
objectives_zh: 应用于新加坡实际情境

sections.title: Algebraic Expansion
sections.content: Expand (a+b)(c+d) = ac + ad + bc + bd. Use FOIL method (First, Outer, Inner, Last). Example: Calculate total cost when buying multiple items with Singapore GST (9%).
sections.content_zh: 展开(a+b)(c+d) = ac + ad + bc + bd。使用FOIL法（首、外、内、尾）。例如：计算购买多件物品加新加坡消费税（9%）的总成本。

sections.title: Factorization
sections.content: Factorize by: 1) Common factors, 2) Grouping, 3) Difference of two squares (a²-b²=(a+b)(a-b)). Used in Singapore construction calculations for HDB floor areas.
sections.content_zh: 因式分解：1）提公因式，2）分组，3）平方差公式(a²-b²=(a+b)(a-b))。用于新加坡组屋楼面面积的建筑计算。

sections.title: Changing the Subject
sections.content: To make x the subject: 1) Move terms not containing x to one side, 2) Isolate x by inverse operations. Example: Convert temperature formulas C = (F-32)×5/9 (Singapore uses Celsius, understand Fahrenheit).
sections.content_zh: 将x作为主项：1）将不含x的项移到一边，2）用逆运算分离x。例如：转换温度公式C = (F-32)×5/9（新加坡使用摄氏度，理解华氏度）。

title: Quadratic Expressions & Equations
description_zh: 因式分解和求解二次方程
objectives: Solve simple quadratic equations using formula
Apply to area and motion problems
objectives_zh: 用因式分解求解二次方程
用公式求解简单二次方程
应用于面积和运动问题

sections.title: Factorizing Quadratics
sections.content: To factorize x²+bx+c, find two numbers that multiply to c and add to b. For ax²+bx+c, use cross-method or grouping. Example: Calculate rectangular HDB room dimensions when area is known.
sections.content_zh: 因式分解x²+bx+c，找两个数相乘等于c，相加等于b。对于ax²+bx+c，使用十字相乘法或分组。例如：已知面积计算组屋房间矩形尺寸。

sections.title: Solving by Factorization
sections.content: Steps: 1) Rearrange to ax²+bx+c=0, 2) Factorize to (x+p)(x+q)=0, 3) Set each factor to zero: x+p=0 or x+q=0. Used in Singapore projectile motion (throwing objects).
sections.content_zh: 步骤：1）重排为ax²+bx+c=0，2）因式分解为(x+p)(x+q)=0，3）令每个因子为零：x+p=0或x+q=0。用于新加坡抛物运动（投掷物体）。

sections.title: Quadratic Formula
sections.content: For ax²+bx+c=0: x = (-b ± √(b²-4ac)) / 2a. Use when factorization is difficult. Singapore applications: calculating optimal prices with profit margins.
sections.content_zh: 对于ax²+bx+c=0：x = (-b ± √(b²-4ac)) / 2a。当因式分解困难时使用。新加坡应用：计算利润率的最优价格。

title: Functions and Graphs
description: Understanding functions, domain, range, and graphing
description_zh: 理解函数、定义域、值域和绘图

sections.title: Function Notation
sections.content: f(x) means 'function of x'. If f(x)=2x+3, then f(5)=2(5)+3=13. Example: Singapore taxi fare function f(d)=base+rate×distance, where d is distance in km.
sections.content_zh: f(x)表示'x的函数'。如果f(x)=2x+3，则f(5)=2(5)+3=13。例如：新加坡出租车费用函数f(d)=起步价+单价×距离，其中d是公里距离。

sections.title: Domain and Range
sections.content: Domain: all possible input (x) values. Range: all possible output (y) values. For Singapore context: f(t)=temperature during day, domain is 0≤t≤24 hours, range is 24≤f(t)≤33°C.
sections.content_zh: 定义域：所有可能的输入(x)值。值域：所有可能的输出(y)值。新加坡情境：f(t)=一天中的温度，定义域是0≤t≤24小时，值域是24≤f(t)≤33°C。

sections.title: Drawing Graphs
sections.content: Plot points by substituting x values into function. Join points smoothly for linear/quadratic functions. Example: Graph Singapore MRT crowd levels by time of day.
sections.content_zh: 通过将x值代入函数绘制点。对于线性/二次函数平滑连接点。例如：绘制新加坡地铁客流量随时间变化的图形。

title: Linear Inequalities
description_zh: 求解和绘制线性不等式
objectives_zh: 求解二元线性不等式组

sections.title: Solving Inequalities
sections.content: Solve like equations, but reverse inequality sign when multiplying/dividing by negative number. Example: Singapore student budget - if you have $50 and items cost $7 each, how many can you buy? 7x ≤ 50, x ≤ 7.14, so maximum 7 items.
sections.content_zh: 像方程一样求解，但乘除负数时反转不等号。例如：新加坡学生预算 - 如果你有50元，物品每件7元，能买多少？7x ≤ 50，x ≤ 7.14，所以最多7件。

sections.title: Number Line Representation
sections.content: Use open circle (○) for < or >, closed circle (●) for ≤ or ≥. Shade region of solutions. For x > 3, open circle at 3, shade right.
sections.content_zh: 对于<或>使用空心圆（○），对于≤或≥使用实心圆（●）。阴影表示解的区域。对于x > 3，在3处空心圆，向右阴影。

sections.title: Real-World Applications
sections.content: Inequalities model constraints: Singapore HDB income ceiling ($14,000/month for BTO), age restrictions (≥21 for marriage), speed limits (≤50 km/h in residential), temperature ranges (aircon 23-25°C).
sections.content_zh: 不等式模拟约束：新加坡组屋收入上限（预购组屋月收入≤$14,000）、年龄限制（结婚≥21岁）、速度限制（住宅区≤50 km/h）、温度范围（空调23-25°C）。

title: Indices (Index Notation)
description: Laws of indices and calculations with powers
objectives: Apply laws of indices: aᵐ × aⁿ = aᵐ⁺ⁿ
objectives_zh: 应用指数定律：aᵐ × aⁿ = aᵐ⁺ⁿ

sections.title: Laws of Indices
sections.content: Key laws: aᵐ × aⁿ = aᵐ⁺ⁿ, aᵐ ÷ aⁿ = aᵐ⁻ⁿ, (aᵐ)ⁿ = aᵐⁿ, a⁰ = 1, a⁻ⁿ = 1/aⁿ. Singapore application: exponential growth of population (5.7 million in 2023).
sections.content_zh: 关键定律：aᵐ × aⁿ = aᵐ⁺ⁿ，aᵐ ÷ aⁿ = aᵐ⁻ⁿ，(aᵐ)ⁿ = aᵐⁿ，a⁰ = 1，a⁻ⁿ = 1/aⁿ。新加坡应用：人口指数增长（2023年570万）。

sections.title: Negative and Zero Indices
sections.content: Any number to power 0 equals 1: 5⁰=1. Negative power is reciprocal: 2⁻³ = 1/2³ = 1/8. Used in Singapore science: measuring small quantities in labs.
sections.content_zh: 任何数的0次方等于1：5⁰=1。负指数是倒数：2⁻³ = 1/2³ = 1/8。用于新加坡科学：实验室测量微小量。

sections.title: Scientific Notation
sections.content: Write large/small numbers as a × 10ⁿ where 1≤a<10. Singapore examples: Area = 733.1 km² = 7.331 × 10² km², Population density = 8,000/km² = 8 × 10³/km².
sections.content_zh: 将大/小数字写成a × 10ⁿ，其中1≤a<10。新加坡例子：面积 = 733.1 km² = 7.331 × 10² km²，人口密度 = 8,000/km² = 8 × 10³/km²。

title: Congruence and Similarity
description: Congruent and similar triangles, scale drawings
description_zh: 全等三角形和相似三角形，比例绘图
objectives: Identify congruent triangles (SSS, SAS, ASA, RHS)
Apply to scale drawings and maps
objectives_zh: 应用于比例绘图和地图

sections.title: Congruent Triangles
sections.content: Triangles are congruent if same shape and size. Tests: SSS (3 sides equal), SAS (2 sides and included angle), ASA (2 angles and included side), RHS (right angle, hypotenuse, side). Singapore construction: ensuring HDB building frames are identical.
sections.content_zh: 三角形形状和大小相同则全等。判定：SSS（三边相等）、SAS（两边及夹角）、ASA（两角及夹边）、RHS（直角、斜边、边）。新加坡建筑：确保组屋建筑框架相同。

sections.title: Similar Triangles
sections.content: Triangles are similar if same shape but different size. Tests: AAA (3 angles equal), SAS (2 sides proportional with equal included angle). Corresponding sides are proportional. Example: Scale models of Singapore landmarks.
sections.content_zh: 三角形形状相同但大小不同则相似。判定：AAA（三角相等）、SAS（两边成比例且夹角相等）。对应边成比例。例如：新加坡地标的比例模型。

sections.title: Scale Drawings
sections.content: Scale 1:n means drawing is 1/n of actual size. Scale 1:50000 on Singapore map means 1 cm = 0.5 km. Used in HDB floor plans, MRT network maps.
sections.content_zh: 比例1:n表示图形是实际大小的1/n。新加坡地图上1:50000表示1厘米 = 0.5公里。用于组屋平面图、地铁网络图。

title: Pythagoras' Theorem
description: Application of Pythagoras' theorem in 2D and 3D
description_zh: 勾股定理在二维和三维中的应用
objectives: Find unknown sides in right-angled triangles
objectives_zh: 求直角三角形中的未知边
解决三维形状中的问题
应用于新加坡实际情境

sections.title: Pythagoras in 2D
sections.content: For right-angled triangle: a²+b²=c² where c is hypotenuse. Find missing side: rearrange formula. Example: Calculate diagonal distance across rectangular HDB void deck, or shortest path across Singapore Botanic Gardens rectangular lawn.
sections.content_zh: 对于直角三角形：a²+b²=c²，其中c是斜边。求缺边：重排公式。例如：计算组屋空地矩形对角线距离，或穿过新加坡植物园矩形草坪的最短路径。

sections.title: Pythagoras in 3D
sections.content: For cuboid with length l, width w, height h: diagonal d² = l²+w²+h². Apply twice: first find base diagonal, then use with height. Example: HDB room corner to opposite corner distance, or lift cable length.
sections.content_zh: 对于长方体，长l、宽w、高h：对角线d² = l²+w²+h²。应用两次：先求底面对角线，再与高度使用。例如：组屋房间角到对角的距离，或电梯电缆长度。

sections.title: Real-World Applications
sections.content: Pythagoras used in: Singapore construction (checking if corners are 90°), navigation (shortest distance between MRT stations), surveying (measuring building heights), sports (calculating field dimensions).
sections.content_zh: 勾股定理用于：新加坡建筑（检查角是否为90°）、导航（地铁站之间的最短距离）、测量（测量建筑物高度）、体育（计算场地尺寸）。

title: Properties of Circles
description: Circle theorems, arc, chord, and tangent properties
description_zh: 圆定理、弧、弦和切线性质

sections.title: Parts of a Circle
sections.content: Radius: center to circumference. Diameter: 2 × radius, passes through center. Chord: line joining two points on circle. Arc: part of circumference. Tangent: line touching circle at one point. Example: Singapore's roundabouts (circular roads).
sections.content_zh: 半径：圆心到圆周。直径：2 × 半径，通过圆心。弦：连接圆上两点的线。弧：圆周的一部分。切线：在一点接触圆的线。例如：新加坡的环岛（圆形道路）。

sections.title: Angle Properties
sections.content: Key theorems: Angle in semicircle = 90°. Angles in same segment are equal. Angle at center = 2 × angle at circumference. Used in Singapore: designing circular gardens, roundabouts, observation wheel (Singapore Flyer).
sections.content_zh: 关键定理：半圆上的角 = 90°。同弧所对的圆周角相等。圆心角 = 2 × 圆周角。用于新加坡：设计圆形花园、环岛、观景轮（新加坡摩天观景轮）。

sections.title: Tangent Properties
sections.content: Tangent perpendicular to radius at point of contact. Two tangents from external point are equal length. Example: Singapore cable car routes touch circular supports, wheel spokes perpendicular to rim.
sections.content_zh: 切线在切点处垂直于半径。从外部点引的两条切线长度相等。例如：新加坡缆车路线接触圆形支架，车轮辐条垂直于边缘。

title: Mensuration: Area & Perimeter
description: Advanced area and perimeter of composite shapes
description_zh: 复合图形的高级面积和周长
objectives: Find area and circumference of circles
Apply to HDB floor plans and parks
objectives_zh: 计算梯形、平行四边形的面积
应用于组屋平面图和公园

sections.title: Area of Quadrilaterals
sections.content: Trapezium: A = ½(a+b)h where a, b are parallel sides, h is height. Parallelogram: A = base × height. Example: Singapore HDB multi-storey carpark ramps (trapezoidal), playground designs.
sections.content_zh: 梯形：A = ½(a+b)h，其中a、b是平行边，h是高。平行四边形：A = 底 × 高。例如：新加坡组屋多层停车场坡道（梯形）、游乐场设计。

sections.title: Circles: Area & Circumference
sections.content: Circumference: C = 2πr or πd. Area: A = πr². For sectors: arc length = θ/360 × 2πr, sector area = θ/360 × πr². Singapore application: roundabout areas, circular gardens (Gardens by the Bay), fountain designs.
sections.content_zh: 周长：C = 2πr或πd。面积：A = πr²。对于扇形：弧长 = θ/360 × 2πr，扇形面积 = θ/360 × πr²。新加坡应用：环岛面积、圆形花园（滨海湾花园）、喷泉设计。

sections.title: Composite Shapes
sections.content: Break complex shapes into simpler parts (rectangles, triangles, circles). Add/subtract areas. Example: HDB flat floor plans (L-shaped rooms), Singapore parks with mixed shapes.
sections.content_zh: 将复杂形状分解为简单部分（矩形、三角形、圆形）。加减面积。例如：组屋平面图（L形房间）、新加坡混合形状的公园。

title: Mensuration: Volume & Surface Area
description: Volume and surface area of prisms, cylinders, pyramids, cones, spheres
description_zh: 棱柱、圆柱、棱锥、圆锥、球的体积和表面积
objectives: Calculate volume and surface area of prisms
Find volume and surface area of cylinders
Calculate for pyramids, cones, and spheres
Apply to Singapore water tanks, buildings
objectives_zh: 计算棱柱的体积和表面积
求圆柱的体积和表面积
应用于新加坡水箱、建筑物

sections.title: Prisms and Cylinders
sections.content: Prism: V = base area × height. Cylinder: V = πr²h, Surface area = 2πr² + 2πrh. Singapore examples: HDB water tanks (cylindrical), rectangular storage rooms, MRT tunnels.
sections.content_zh: 棱柱：V = 底面积 × 高。圆柱：V = πr²h，表面积 = 2πr² + 2πrh。新加坡例子：组屋水箱（圆柱形）、矩形储藏室、地铁隧道。

sections.title: Pyramids and Cones
sections.content: Pyramid: V = ⅓ × base area × height. Cone: V = ⅓πr²h, Surface area = πr² + πrl (l=slant height). Example: Singapore roof designs, traffic cones, decorative structures.
sections.content_zh: 棱锥：V = ⅓ × 底面积 × 高。圆锥：V = ⅓πr²h，表面积 = πr² + πrl（l=斜高）。例如：新加坡屋顶设计、交通锥、装饰结构。

sections.title: Spheres
sections.content: Volume: V = ⁴⁄₃πr³. Surface area: A = 4πr². Singapore applications: dome structures (Science Centre), spherical water tanks, globe at Esplanade, sports balls.
sections.content_zh: 体积：V = ⁴⁄₃πr³。表面积：A = 4πr²。新加坡应用：圆顶结构（科学中心）、球形水箱、滨海艺术中心地球仪、运动球。

title: Data Analysis & Statistics
description: Mean, median, mode, range, and interpreting data
description_zh: 均值、中位数、众数、极差和数据解释
objectives_zh: 计算均值、中位数、众数、极差
应用于新加坡数据（人口、天气）

sections.title: Measures of Central Tendency
sections.content: Mean: sum ÷ count. Median: middle value when ordered. Mode: most frequent value. Example: Average temperature in Singapore (mean 28°C), median HDB resale price, most common family size (mode).
sections.content_zh: 均值：总和 ÷ 数量。中位数：排序后的中间值。众数：最频繁的值。例如：新加坡平均温度（均值28°C）、组屋转售价格中位数、最常见家庭规模（众数）。

sections.title: Range and Spread
sections.content: Range: highest - lowest value. Measures spread of data. Large range = more variation. Example: Singapore daily temperature range (24-33°C = 9°C range), exam scores range.
sections.content_zh: 极差：最高值 - 最低值。测量数据分布。大极差 = 更多变化。例如：新加坡日温差（24-33°C = 9°C极差）、考试分数极差。

sections.title: Statistical Charts
sections.content: Bar charts: compare categories. Pie charts: show proportions. Line graphs: show trends over time. Example: Singapore population growth chart, ethnic composition pie chart, MRT ridership trends.
sections.content_zh: 条形图：比较类别。饼图：显示比例。折线图：显示随时间的趋势。例如：新加坡人口增长图表、种族组成饼图、地铁乘客量趋势。

title: Probability
description: Basic probability, combined events, and probability trees
description_zh: 基本概率、复合事件和概率树

sections.title: Basic Probability
sections.content: Probability = favorable outcomes ÷ total outcomes. Value between 0 (impossible) and 1 (certain). Example: Probability of rain in Singapore (high in Nov-Jan), probability of bus arriving within 5 min.
sections.content_zh: 概率 = 有利结果 ÷ 总结果。值在0（不可能）和1（确定）之间。例如：新加坡下雨的概率（11-1月高）、5分钟内公交车到达的概率。

sections.title: Combined Events
sections.content: AND: multiply probabilities (P(A and B) = P(A) × P(B) if independent). OR: add probabilities (P(A or B) = P(A) + P(B) if mutually exclusive). Example: Probability of catching both MRT and bus on time.
sections.content_zh: 与：乘概率（如果独立，P(A且B) = P(A) × P(B)）。或：加概率（如果互斥，P(A或B) = P(A) + P(B)）。例如：地铁和公交车都准点的概率。

sections.title: Probability Trees
sections.content: Tree diagrams show all possible outcomes with probabilities on branches. Multiply along branches for final probability. Example: Singapore weather forecasts (sunny/rainy over multiple days).
sections.content_zh: 树形图显示所有可能结果，分支上标概率。沿分支相乘得最终概率。例如：新加坡天气预报（多日晴天/雨天）。

title: Sets and Venn Diagrams
description: Set notation, operations, and Venn diagrams
description_zh: 集合符号、运算和维恩图
objectives_zh: 执行集合运算（并集、交集）

sections.title: Set Notation
sections.content: Set: collection of objects. Element: ∈ (belongs to). Subset: ⊆. Empty set: ∅. Example: Set of Singapore MRT lines = {Red, Green, Purple, Yellow, Blue, Brown, Grey}, set of primes < 10 = {2,3,5,7}.
sections.content_zh: 集合：对象的集合。元素：∈（属于）。子集：⊆。空集：∅。例如：新加坡地铁线路集合 = {红、绿、紫、黄、蓝、棕、灰}，小于10的质数集合 = {2,3,5,7}。

sections.title: Set Operations
sections.content: Union A∪B: all elements in A or B. Intersection A∩B: elements in both A and B. Complement A': elements not in A. Example: Students taking Math ∪ Science, students in both Chess ∩ Robotics clubs.
sections.content_zh: 并集A∪B：A或B中的所有元素。交集A∩B：同时在A和B中的元素。补集A'：不在A中的元素。例如：选数学∪科学的学生，同时参加国际象棋∩机器人俱乐部的学生。

sections.title: Venn Diagrams
sections.content: Visual representation of sets using overlapping circles. Overlap shows intersection. Use to solve problems with 2-3 sets. Example: Singapore students studying Mandarin, Malay, Tamil; students playing football, basketball.
sections.content_zh: 使用重叠圆圈直观表示集合。重叠显示交集。用于解决2-3个集合的问题。例如：学习华语、马来语、泰米尔语的新加坡学生；踢足球、打篮球的学生。
